mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tso.org_id_ AS "orgId" ,tso.org_name AS "orgName" ,tso.org_code AS "orgCode" ,tso.org_business AS "orgBusiness" ,tso.org_synopsis AS "orgSynopsis" ,tso.org_account AS "orgAccount" ,tso.org_logo AS "orgLogo" ,DATE_FORMAT(tso.org_register_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS "orgRegisterTime" ,tso.business_type AS "businessType" ,tsp.pre_value AS "businessTypeName" ,tso.org_speciality AS "orgSpeciality" ,tso.org_show AS "orgShow" ,tso.org_status AS "orgStatus" ,tso.operate_status AS "operateStatus" ,tso.`org_principal` AS "orgPrincipal" ,tso.`org_busin_type` AS "orgBusinType" ,tso.`org_busin_address` AS "orgBusinAddresse" ,tso.`org_busin_scope` AS "orgBusinScope" ,tsoi.org_phone AS "orgPhone" ,tsoi.org_province AS "orgProvince" ,tsoi.org_city AS "orgCity" ,tsoi.org_area AS "orgArea" ,tsoi.org_address AS "orgAddress" ,CONCAT( tsoi.org_province, tsoi.org_city, tsoi.org_area, tsoi.org_address ) AS "orgAddressDetail" ,tsoi.org_web AS "orgWeb" ,tsoi.con_name AS "conName" ,tsoi.con_phone AS "conPhone" ,tsoi.con_email AS "conEmail" ,tsoe.staff_count AS "staffCount" ,tsoe.profession_num AS "professionNum" ,tsoe.bachelor_num AS "bachelorNum" ,tsoe.master_num AS "masterNum" ,tsoe.`doctor_num` AS "doctorNum" ,tsoe.returnee_num AS "returneeNum" ,(SELECT COUNT(tsr.org_id_) FROM tb_service_require tsr WHERE tsr.org_id_ =#{orgId} AND tsr.record_status = 1 AND tsr.handle_result = '1' ) AS "transactionCount" ,IFNULL(AVG(sra.`attitude_score`),0) AS "orgServiceScore" ,SUM(CASE WHEN sra.`attitude_score` IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS "evaluationNum" FROM tb_service_org tso LEFT JOIN tb_service_prefer tsp ON tso.business_type=tsp.id AND tsp.pre_type='0' AND tsp.record_status=1 LEFT JOIN tb_service_org_info tsoi ON tsoi.`org_id_`=tso.`org_id_` AND tsoi.`record_status`=1 LEFT JOIN tb_service_org_element tsoe ON tsoe.`org_id_`=tso.`org_id_` AND tsoe.`record_status`=1 LEFT JOIN tb_service_rating sra ON sra.`org_id_`=tso.`org_id_` AND sra.`record_status`=1 WHERE 1=1 AND tso.`record_status`=1 AND tso.`org_id_`=#{orgId} GROUP BY tso.org_id_ ,tso.org_name ,tso.org_code ,tso.org_business ,tso.org_synopsis ,tso.org_account ,tso.org_logo ,tso.org_register_time ,tso.business_type ,tsp.pre_value ,tso.org_speciality ,tso.org_show ,tso.org_status ,tso.operate_status ,tso.`org_principal` ,tso.`org_busin_type` ,tso.`org_busin_address` ,tso.`org_busin_scope` ,tsoi.org_phone ,tsoi.org_province ,tsoi.org_city ,tsoi.org_area ,tsoi.org_address ,tsoi.org_web ,tsoi.con_name ,tsoi.con_phone ,tsoi.con_email ,tsoe.staff_count ,tsoe.profession_num ,tsoe.bachelor_num ,tsoe.master_num ,tsoe.`doctor_num` ,tsoe.returnee_num

select count(t1.org_id_) as "productNum", (select count(t2.org_id_) from tb_service_advisor t2 where t2.org_id_=#{orgId} and t2.approval_status = '2') as "advisorNum" from tb_service_product t1 where t1.org_id_ = #{orgId}
SELECT SUM(t.num) AS "orgNum" FROM (SELECT COUNT(org_id_) AS 'num' FROM tb_service_product t WHERE t.status = '1' AND t.record_status = '1' AND t.template_id = #{productId} GROUP BY t.org_id_) t

select count(sa.advisor_account) from tb_service_product sp join tb_service_and_advisor saa on sp.product_id=saa.product_id join tb_service_advisor sa on sa.advisor_account=saa.advisor_account and sa.approval_status='2' and sa.record_status='1' where sp.template_id =#{productId}
select count(sr.req_num) from tb_service_product sp left join tb_service_require sr on sp.product_id=sr.product_id and sr.status='2' and sr.record_status='1' where sp.template_id =#{productId}
